00020 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00021 void EntityManager::registerEntity(BaseGameEntity* _newEntity)
00022 {
00023   EntityManager::s_entityMap.insert(std::make_pair(_newEntity->getID(), _newEntity));
00024 }
00025 
00026 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00027 BaseGameEntity* EntityManager::getEntityFromID(int _ID)const
00028 {
00029   EntityMap::const_iterator entity = s_entityMap.find(_ID);
00030   assert ( (entity !=  s_entityMap.end()) && "<EntityManager::GetEntityFromID>: invalid ID ");
00031   return (BaseGameEntity*)entity->second;
00032 }
00033 
00034 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00035 void EntityManager::removeEntity(BaseGameEntity* _entity)
00036 {
00037   s_entityMap.erase(s_entityMap.find(_entity->getID()));
00038 }
00039 
00040 void EntityManager::clearMap()
00041 {
00042     s_entityMap.clear();
00043 }
